body: The Fuck?ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
NTR with Happy Ending? Wow, that's rare
A la mrd este ntr enserio es una puta esta mujer y el prota ni se da cuenta mrd

So this all started with usual NTR-ish stuff, but for some reason near the end the guys felt bad for the husband when they saw the wife's face (idk?) and decided to bounce and told the fat old dude to never make her do that again, so lastly the wife for some reason forgot everything that happened and now became horny only for the hubby....... can't say that I fully understand since I barely read the thing but.... meh. I'd say this was okay. As long as it didn't end bad like hearthbroken or destroyed then i'm cool with it.
